articles.title: BBL: Mitchell Marsh lashes out at umpire after wrongly being given out, gets fined $5,000 - WATCH - Hindustan Times
articles.description: After being given out, Marsh looked visibly angry and frustrated and slammed his bat on the crease. He then screamed at the umpire before walking off.
articles.content: Australia allrounder Mitchell Marsh was fined $5,000 after being charged with a Level 2 Offence under the Cricket Australia Code of Conduct, CA said in a statement on Sunday. The announcement came a … [+1136 chars]
